category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_Result_File_Download_Client_Path
preference.preference_description: Specifies the absolute path to the International Material Data System (IMDS) download batch client. This value is used by the "imds_process_result_file" utility.
